full_text: >> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS)" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 7/31/2019 3:07 PM >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) just sent the below correction. From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov] Sent: Wednesday, July 31, 2019 3:05 PM To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usms.doj.gov> Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Subject: Epstein #76318-054 Importance: High Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Wanted to clarify from our earlier conversation - Epstein does currently have a cellmate. He was placed with inmate Reyes #85993-054. Please let me know if you need more info. Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: 646-836-7665 Page 1545

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov] Sent: Wednesday, July 31, 2019 3:05 PM To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usms.doj.gov> Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Subject: Epstein #76318-054 Importance: High

Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Wanted to clarify from our earlier conversation - Epstein does currently have a cellmate. He was placed with inmate Reyes #85993-054. Please let me know if you need more info. Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document is an email with redactions. The email discusses Jeffrey Epstein's cellmate and provides contact information for the sender.
